meanings.definition: Delay or hold back in terms of progress or development.
meanings.sent1: I accidentally retardate my project by forgetting to save my work.
meanings.sent2: The heavy traffic will retardate our arrival at the party.
meanings.sent3: Trying to carry all the groceries in one trip really retardated my progress.
meanings.sent4: The storm's strong winds retardated the construction of the new building.
meanings.sent5: The broken elevator retardated our journey to the top floor.

meanings.definition: A person who is mentally impaired or has a developmental disability.
meanings.sent1: The school provides special assistance for the retardate students.
meanings.sent2: She works at a center that supports retardate individuals.
meanings.sent3: The comedian joked about a genius cat and a retardate dog in his show.
meanings.sent4: In the story, the wise owl helps the retardate squirrel find its way home.
meanings.sent5: The superhero movie featured a team of heroes, including a retardate with extraordinary powers.
